channel.title: CVE Feed for Cloudflare -- Cloudflare-WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Cloudflare -- Cloudflare-WordPress

item.title: CVE-2024-0212|2024-08-01T17:41:16.185Z -- cloudflare -- cloudflare-wordpress
item.description: The Cloudflare Wordpress plugin was found to be vulnerable to improper authentication. The vulnerability enables attackers with a lower privileged account to access data from the Cloudflare API.
